name: Robert Lee AARON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Aaron v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Robert Lee AARON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of April, 2005, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed. The Motion for Appointment of Counsel is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
872 A.2d 1124
Robert Lee AARON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Decided April 13, 2005.
